scripts.build:server: npm run build:authd && npm run build:blobvault && npm run build:dataapi && npm run build:rpc
scripts.pull:authd: if [[ "${DOCKER_TAG}" == "" ]]; then docker pull tidepay/authd ; else docker pull tidepay/authd:$DOCKER_TAG; fi
scripts.pull:blobvault: if [[ "${DOCKER_TAG}" == "" ]]; then docker pull tidepay/blobvault ; else docker pull tidepay/blobvault:$DOCKER_TAG; fi
scripts.pull:dataapi: if [[ "${DOCKER_TAG}" == "" ]]; then docker pull tidepay/dataapi ; else docker pull tidepay/dataapi:$DOCKER_TAG; fi
scripts.pull:rpc: if [[ "${DOCKER_TAG}" == "" ]]; then docker pull tidepay/rpc ; else docker pull tidepay/rpc:$DOCKER_TAG; fi
scripts.pull:server: npm run pull:authd && npm run pull:blobvault && npm run pull:dataapi && npm run pull:rpc
scripts.push:server: npm run push:authd && npm run push:blobvault && npm run push:dataapi && npm run push:rpc
scripts.tidepay: chmod 600 .pgpass && if [[ "${DOCKER_TAG}" == "" ]]; then DOCKER_TAG=latest docker-compose up; else docker-compose up; fi
